problem.markdown:
>>Leached nutrients such as iron oxides and aluminum oxides accumulate in which soil horizon? << () O horizon () A horizon () E horizon (x) B horizon () C horizon
[explanation] Nutrients leach through the E (eluviated) horizon to the B horizon, which is often a reddish color as a result of the presence of iron and aluminum oxides. [explanation]
problem.p: Leached nutrients such as iron oxides and aluminum oxides accumulate in which soil horizon?

choicegroup.label: Leached nutrients such as iron oxides and aluminum oxides accumulate in which soil horizon?

div.p: Nutrients leach through the E (eluviated) horizon to the B horizon, which is often a reddish color as a result of the presence of iron and aluminum oxides.
